entry.title: Steal this idea - #1 -
entry.content: I keep coming up with ideas for projects/apps/startups, and I keep noting them down with full intention of building them some day. But over time, I have realized that I will probably never have time to get to most of them. Hence, I am going to start posting them here, in the hope that someone else will build them. So go ahead and steal this idea :)
